1.How do you Pay? 
 1.1.Payment is completed in store and 
 can be done via card or cash 
 2.Is the Food Fresh? 
 2.1.All food is freshly made in the 
 downstairs kitchen and any Food 
 allergies should be checked through 
 the app or with the staff in store 
 3.Where is the Cafe? 
 3.1.Marylebone,27 Chiltern St, London 
 W1U 7PJ 
 4.How do I order? 
 4.1.First complete the sign up form 
 then proceed to login and choose 
 what menu you wish to use 
 according 
 to the time and then tap the items you 
 want and complete your order at the 
 checkout screen
